section.title: Combat
section.content:
Combat follows initiative order.
Player characters and non-player characters are called actors in combat. When combat begins, actors are required to roll for their initiative. Initiative is always a d20 roll with any additional modifiers that might apply to the actor.

section.title: Attacking
section.content: An actor may attack another actor during combat. This is done with an opposed roll using a d20.
